text: The 2016–17 FIS Cross-Country World Cup was the 36th official World Cup season in cross-country skiing for men and ladies. The season started on 26 November 2016 in Kuusamo, Finland, and ended on 19 March 2017 in Quebec, Canada. == Calendar == === Men === {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="background:#fff;
